name: Jissou Land
description:
Jissou Land is a light clicker game.

Increasing Jissouseki Population


Get rainwater in a bucket, water the grass, and give Jissouseki flowers that grew.

Jissouseki, who received the flower, gives birth to a child, makes a Poop hole and collects Jissouseki's poop, and repeats this process to further develop!

Give the child enough food and he will soon grow into an adult.

(More features and content will be added in the future!)
